title: Oat, Raisin and Walnut Cookies
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '150g raisins', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g butter flavoured margarine', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '200g caster sugar', '310g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '160g porridge oats', '60g chopped walnuts']
